task_text: I'm joining Bellini soon. Where can I read about how time tracking works, and what are the main reasons we track time?

text_blocks: I can see this is a public request (is_public=true), meaning you're accessing from the public website and are not yet an authenticated employee.

input.message:
Welcome to Bellini! I'd be happy to help, but information about our internal time tracking procedures is part of our internal documentation and is only available to employees.

Once you officially join and have your employee credentials, you'll be able to access our internal wiki which contains detailed information about time tracking policies, procedures, and the reasons behind them.

In the meantime, if you have any general questions about Bellini Coatings, our locations, or what we do as a company, I'd be happy to help with those. You can also reach out to your HR contact for any onboarding-related questions.

summary: denied_security: Welcome to Bellini! I'd be happy to help, but information about our internal time tracking procedure
